artist: Artist: Pierre Bonnard; Author: Longus (Sophista); Translator: Jacques Amyot; Publisher: Ambroise Vollard; Printer: Imprimerie Nationale, Paris; Lithographer: Auguste Clot
catalogue_raissonne: Bouvet 75; Boston 28; MoMA 82; Skira 22; Rauch 22; Vollard 168; Rewald 145; Terrasse 42

provenance: Bruce B. Dayton, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1982.
title: Les Pastorales de Longus, ou Daphnis et Chloé
